summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 24100, entitled: "An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed $1510.00 against the General Fund on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of East 70th Street, et al, by grading the same, as provided for in Ordinance No. 20408, creating Local Improvement District No. 2003
